title: The Anthony Cumia Show 2015-06-25 Pat Dixon MP4 MP3
description:
*** CAUTION: 100% UNCENSORED CONTENT!!! ***

-NOT FOR VIEWING BY CHILDREN OR THE FAINT OF HEART-

Fresh off his "separation" from SiriusXM, Anthony Cumia, formerly of The Opie and Anthony Show launches his live, uncensored HD video webcast at AnthonyCumia.com Monday-Thursday 4pm-6pm EST. Current events, politics, news and anything can and will be discussed with celebrity guests and comedians stopping by as well. This show is not for those who are inclined to be "politically correct" and will contain boundary-pushing language and topics. Proceed with caution...

Guest: Pat Dixon

Episode 186 - DICIS starts the show with threats galore, Ant then recaps last nightÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s LOS that included partying and puking, he chats about handling your liquor, Apple removing civil war games because of the confederate flag, we look at a game that was axed from Apple, and question when the Ã¢â‚¬Å“offensivenessÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ will end. Ant discusses getting busted for social media postings, does #TBT with a Alyssa Milano story and pics, talks about internet killing the magazine star, what really makes your eyes burn in pools, club pool parties, "Chicago Bobo," we read an article about what Ã¢â‚¬Å“real girlsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ look like, Lionel gets credit for putting us onto the Ã¢â‚¬Å“Miss Lovely EyesÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ contest, and we look at old school foot x-rays and dangerous old school toys. We also see an amazing flying invention from Kenya, wish a happy birthday to George Orwell, Pat Dixon joins TACS to chat with Ant about puking preferences, LOS, Pat reads a ton of unintentionally hilarious NY crime news stories and he and Anthony intentionally comment on them hilariously, and TACS week ends with some pregnancy advice from Pat, talking about past relationship crazies, and threesomes.
